function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of misinformation related to COVID-19 on social media","Impact":"Increased panic and unnecessary fear among the public","Mitigation":"Increased awareness and education on identifying and avoiding fake news, fact-checking before sharing information","Technologies":"AI algorithms for detecting fake news, social media fact-checking tools","People":"General public, social media users","Owner":"Social media platforms, government health agencies, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Low environmental and personal hygiene awareness due to social media","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread","Mitigation":"Education and promotion of hygiene practices, collaboration with social media influencers to promote hygiene awareness","Technologies":"Hygiene tracking apps, social media campaigns","People":"General public","Owner":"Government health agencies, hygiene product companies, social media influencers"}]}
